titleStmt.title: The guide in controversies, or, A rational account of the doctrine of Roman-Catholicks concerning the ecclesiastical guide in controversies of religion reflecting on the later writings of Protestants, particularly of Archbishop Lawd and Dr. Stillingfleet on this subject. / By R.H.
titleStmt.author: R. H., 1609-1678.

notesStmt.note: R. H. is a pseudonym of Abraham Woodhead. Cf. BM.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
